snippet: In my latest Page Two column, I explain the electoral college and some scenarios political experts think could determine who wins in November. Assign states yourself on the interactive map and see how you can change the outcome.
abstract: In my latest Page Two column, I explain the electoral college and some scenarios political experts think could determine who wins in November. Assign states yourself on the interactive map and see how you can change the outcome.

headline.main: The Electoral College and Winning the U.S. Election
